alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 5:15PM EDT until May 21 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ASHTABULA COUNTY... At 515 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Andover, or 12 miles southeast of Ashtabula, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Pierpont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
